egressFlow.description: Name of the egress flow the DeltaFile is flowing through

metadataPrefix.description: The prefix to use in the metadata file keys

name.description: Name of the action used to track data

staticMetadata.description: Static metadata that can be attached to the metadata of the DeltaFile when a DeltaFile is processed by the action

url.description: The URL to post the DeltaFile to
